text:
ASAPP | NY + SF | highly-funded ML/NLP startup (400% growth in 2017, 90 employees now) | Hiring Backend/Fullstack Engineers

Please take a moment to review our engineering team and leadership: https://www.asapp.com/team

ASAPP is a stealth startup solving some really interesting problems using ML and software engineering. Our stack is React and Golang/Python (but you can come from any stack).We require either strong Java/Go/C++/Python AND/OR strong Javascript.

Company Perks: -Very competitive salary -Equity -Daily free lunch -Flexible work hours -100% paid medical benefits -Wellness perks

Please email at mike@asapp.com if you have any questions.
